title: Torch of Revocation
content:
Torch of Revocation Very Rare 3~9 Damage 1d4 +1 Bludgeoning+1d4 Necrotic Weapon Enchantment +1 This staple of any worthwhile exorcist burns with a pale flame that destroys the anchors of troublesome ghosts in need of banishment Club Light 0.9 145

Torch of Revocation

1d4 +1 Bludgeoning+1d4 Necrotic

Weapon Enchantment +1

This staple of any worthwhile exorcist burns with a pale flame that destroys the anchors of troublesome ghosts in need of banishment

Torch of Revocation is a unique torch in
